Name: Encantador
Ingredients: 40 ml Bacardi Carta Blanca Superior White Rum
5 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
History: The British Bacardí Legacy 2013 winning cocktail winning drink created by Chris Moore at The American Bar in The Savoy Hotel , London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Encantador contains 174 calories
